resources.string: This contact includes information from multiple accounts. The contact will be deleted from your phone now and from server after synchronization.
No favorites. To add a contact to favorites, tap the star button in the contact detail screen.
Send message to work mobile phone
Could not access remote voicemail server. Call voicemail server directly to listen to the voicemail message.
Could not download audio file. Call voicemail server directly to listen to the voicemail message.
There is voicemail message waiting on the server but could not be downloaded. Call voicemail server directly to listen to the voicemail message.
Could not retrieve voicemail message from server. Call voicemail server directly to listen to the voicemail message.
Voicemail app configure error. Please configure your voicemail app.

"Upgrading Contacts.
The upgrade process requires approximately %s MB of internal storage.
Choose one of the following options:"
This contact includes information from multiple accounts. The contact will be deleted from your phone now and from server after synchronization.
Type contact name before joining with another
Join the current contact with the selected contact?
Switch to editing the selected contact? Information you entered so far will be copied.
Contact widget added to Home screen
Cannot add Myself or SIM contacts to favorites
Contacts linked. Show below contact details in your contact list:
No contact in this group has any phone number
Delete all contacts on SIM card. This will take a few minutes.
Contacts will be exported but not restricted contact information
Contacts will be sent as \"%s\" except restricted information
No contacts available. You might have selected restricted account data.
Favorites is a reserved name in the system. Use another name for your group.

ICE is an internationally widespread function for reaching relatives or friends in case of an emergency. It is intended for emergency personnel and will be found in the emergency dialer if the phone is locked.

In the ICE information, you can enter your medical status, such as allergies and medications you are using, and contact information to your closest relatives or friends. The ICE information can be accessed from the lock screen even if the phone is locked.
My name, picture and medical info is shown in ICE view
Select in options menu to show name, picture and medical info in ICE view
Contact was added to the list of ICE contacts
Contact was cleared from the list of ICE contacts
Add favorites from your contacts to reach them quickly from this tab
The contacts you communicate with most show up here
Enter name or number using the keypad below to search for a contact

"No contacts are synced from the selected account.
Make sure to sync online contacts from this account or return to the contact list and create contacts on this account. You can also create a group with contacts from another synced account."
The owner of the device hasn’t activated calling ICE contacts from this screen
You have added the maximum number of favorites
"Contacts also provides call log and call features. To use full functionality, tap Allow in the next permission request dialog(s)."
To call phone numbers and read call log
To sync with Calendar (Your events in Calendar will not be sent to other apps or devices)
To use location (Your location will not be sent to other apps or devices)

To sync with Calendar (Your events in Calendar will not be sent to other apps or devices)
